title: BNP Paribas logo
content:
Hello

Could anyone ID the font used in this logo?

Would be much appreciated.

Regards,  
Fredrik

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150126052841im_/http:/typophile.com/files/paribas_5314.gif)
author: crappo

comments.content: This is a custom designed logo, so there is no font unfortunately. :^/
I kind of suspected that, but thanks for confirming it.
